item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 27, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. The CAP theorem of Clustering: Why Every Algorithm Must Sacrifice Something (90 points | 5 comments)
3. Why Did So Many Mid-Century Designers Make Children's Books? (5 points | discuss)

10. Bill requiring US agencies to share source code with each other becomes law (113 points | 35 comments)
11. Magnetic swarm intelligence of mass-produced, programmable microrobot assemblies (27 points | 5 comments)

13. Thermodynamic model identifies how gold reaches Earth's surface (20 points | 3 comments)
14. Gondwanaland: The search for a land before (human) time (45 points | 23 comments)
15. Differential Growth Addon for Blender (255 points | 33 comments)

22. Seconds Since the Epoch (258 points | 179 comments)
23. Portspoof: Emulate a valid service on all 65535 TCP ports (373 points | 138 comments)
24. Ocular AI (YC W24) Is Hiring a Founding Backend Engineer ($120K to $200K, SF) ( | hide)
25. Blackcandy: Self hosted music streaming server (602 points | 261 comments)
26. Cognitive load is what matters (1580 points | 663 comments)
27. Show HN: A singing synthesizer for the browser with automatic 3-part harmony (176 points | 31 comments)

29. Reverse Engineering the Stream Deck+ (54 points | 15 comments)
